resources:
//this is a temporary file for avoiding merge conflict Calibrate your watch Align the hour-hand at 12 o’clock Use the buttons below to allocate the hand at the\n right position. Each press represents one hour. Next >
Align the minute-hand at 12 o’clock Use the buttons below to allocate the hand at the\n right position. Each press represents one minute.
Align the second-hand at 12 o’clock Use the buttons below to allocate the hand at the\n right position. Each press represents one second.
Finish
Compass Compass Enabled Auto turn off motion detection 15m
finisher Set goal Customize... Input the goal
"7000"
"10000"
"20000"
Select your goal Confirm Cancel
